description: This course is for students who need to pass the Global Studies Regents in order to graduate from high school. It gives students the information that they need for success-nothing more and nothing less. Students will learn how to dominate the multiple choice section of the test because doing well on the multiple choice is the key to success on the Global Test. The course consists of 50 videos and Key Idea Charts along with quizzes that use only regents questions. Students watch the videos, take notes about the main idea, and then test their knowledge with online quizzes that reinforce what they have learned. They get the best for the test and nothing less.
title: Global Studies Regents Review
